message?: What you want to say to me ?
butterfly_msg_1: Hey! You can move me with the keyboard ,üîºüîΩ‚óÄÔ∏è‚ñ∂Ô∏è and push space ‚å®Ô∏è and make me fly faster with SPACE üöÄ. You can also scroll with your mouse, I'll move with you and still live my little butterfly life.
butterfly_msg_2: If you keep me in the air and spam SPACE a bit, I go into turbo mode. Easy though, I'm a butterfly, not a jet.
butterfly_msg_3: Honestly, for a butterfly I'm already doing more cardio than you today.
butterfly_msg_4: I can also wander around on my own, but it's way cooler if you tell me where to go.
butterfly_msg_5: So you're just watching me fly and doing nothing? I'm starting to feel a bit ignored here.
butterfly_msg_6: Alright, I get it. You don't like me that much. I'm sulking‚Ä¶ but I'll keep flying anyway.
about_text:
DevOps engineer and full-stack developer, passionate about code and infrastructure.
            TypeScript, JavaScript, Vue, PHP, Node.js, CI/CD, Kubernetes, Docker, GitHub Actions, Vault‚Ä¶ I build reliable and automated projects.
 
           DJ, curator, and A&R, I‚Äôve organized events, promoted artists, and created unique musical experiences.

 Creative, rigorous, and versatile, I turn ideas into real projects ‚Äì web, infrastructure, or music.
works_text:
My portfolio showcases my early projects as a young professional,
           reflecting my acquired skills and practical experiences.
            I'd be glad to add public repositories and live demos.
             My journey is ever-evolving,
              and I take pride in sharing these accomplishments,
               attesting to my commitment to progress in my field of interest.
lecteur_audio_kotlin: Android Native Audio Player Remake exercise
projet_open_source: The Snippet Pack Open Source Project
text_currently_under: Currently under development, our project aims to make access to the music industry easy for all artists. We will be offering quality services at competitive prices, thus helping artists connect with professionals, playlist curators, and influencers. Our goal is to promote their works and gather constructive feedback so they can focus on their art. Coming soon!
text_product_support: Product support and tutorial website, and complete product ordering using WordPress and other related technologies, enabling users to easily generate and manage custom quotes while collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure product quality.
text_LABCOM: I developed the "LABCOM anaVOC" project website using WordPress to allow scientists from Chromatotec, CNRS, and the University of Strasbourg to easily share and update advancements and objectives of the project in the development of real-time analysis methods for Volatile and Semi-Volatile Organic Compounds in air and water, with a focus on user-friendliness for non-coders.
text_review_generator: I developed software that uses OpenAI's engine to generate review-like comments or articles about music artists. This software takes into account many customizable parameters that the user can add to get comprehensive and detailed reviews on the music, providing accurate and personalized analysis.
text_kotlin_player: I practiced with Kotlin by remaking an audio player that utilizes the phone's available audio engine, drawing inspiration from the native Android audio player and iTunes for smartphones.
text_agency_ikone: Agency IK√òNE's website offers comprehensive growth, music marketing, and strategy services for artists, showcasing their talent on digital platforms and guiding them towards sustainable growth in the music industry.
text_blanco_banco: Blanco Bianco is a designer, photographer, and video editor. This website build is to showcase his services, sell the brand's clothing he created, and display his works.
text_findtherose: This is a test website to showcase my music project, our discography, possible tour dates, our bio, photos, and videos.
text_snippet_pack_wordpress: This open-source project gathers PHP snippets and tricks related to WordPress and its ecosystem. You will find useful pieces of code here to customize your WordPress site, implement specific functionalities, use Polylang for multilingual translation, and much more. The community is welcome to contribute by adding new snippets, fixing errors, or improving existing snippets.
experience.1.title: Independent DJ Agency - Nebula Beatz
experience.1.point4: Time Management and Quick Decision Making
experience.1.subPoint1.1: As an independent DJ, I took charge of planning and organizing complete music events. From selecting tracks tailored to the audience to coordinating audio equipment, I demonstrated autonomy to ensure the smooth execution of each event.
experience.1.subPoint2.1: My role as a DJ provided me with the opportunity to express creativity through unique and personalized mixes. I developed the ability to quickly adapt to different atmospheres and audience demands, which became an asset in my approach to development as a software developer.
experience.1.subPoint3.1: Communication is paramount in the DJ world, whether it's creating a connection with the audience, understanding client expectations, or collaborating with other stakeholders in the music industry. These communication skills are equally relevant in my current role as a developer, where I closely collaborate with technical teams and clients.
experience.1.subPoint4.1: The realm of DJing demands quick decision-making regarding music selection and effective time management to adhere to event schedules. These skills have proven beneficial in my role as a developer, where I am accustomed to handling tight deadlines and making informed decisions.

experience.5.title: Infrastructure Engineer - Developer Experience (DevOps)
experience.5.subPoint1.1: Migration and modernization of CI/CD pipelines from Jenkins to GitHub Actions to improve reliability, speed and developer autonomy.
experience.5.subPoint1.2: Redesign of build workflows (Gradle, PHP, Go, Node.js) to reduce execution time and increase reproducibility.
experience.5.subPoint1.3: Migration of CI/CD services and internal tooling from GCP to GKE, including SonarQube, Gradle infrastructure, Satis and monitoring tools.
experience.5.subPoint2.1: Management and optimization of Kubernetes clusters on GKE to ensure performance, resilience and cost efficiency.
experience.5.subPoint2.2: Creation of Helm charts and infrastructure automations to standardize deployments across teams.
experience.5.subPoint2.3: Implementation of best DevOps practices to support application teams and improve platform reliability.
experience.5.subPoint3.1: Setup of KEDA autoscaling to handle high workload peaks (CI tasks, dependency updates, async jobs).
experience.5.subPoint3.2: RabbitMQ-based event-driven workflows to trigger scaling and automate internal processes.
experience.5.subPoint3.3: Complete automation of Renovate workflows using KEDA and RabbitMQ for dependency management and security CVE fixes.
experience.5.subPoint4.1: Integration of Vault for centralized secrets management across CI/CD and runtime environments.
experience.5.subPoint4.2: Strengthening of security posture through automated secret rotations, access policies and platform hardening.
experience.5.subPoint4.3: Contributions to infrastructure monitoring and alerting for improved incident response.
experience.5.subPoint5.1: Improvement of the developer journey by reducing CI times and simplifying deployment processes.
experience.5.subPoint5.2: Development of internal tools, documentation and templates to improve onboarding and daily efficiency.
experience.5.subPoint5.3: Collaboration with engineering teams to identify bottlenecks and deliver DX-focused solutions.
